official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Postmaster General should not issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of any individual who, at the time of his death, was a member of the communist party or was no longer a citizen of the United States because he had renounced his citizenship.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Postmaster General should not issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of any individual who, at the time of his death, was a member of the communist party or was no longer a U.S. citizen because he had renounced his citizenship.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Postmaster General should not issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of any individual who, at the time of his death, was a member of the communist party or was no longer a citizen of the United States because he had renounced his citizenship.
